name: Joined Caves
description:
As you wake up at the bottom of a cave, you find a machine that lets you go forwards and backwards in time. Use the seeds and sticks that are scattered in the cave along with the grappling hook and time machine to find a way out

Controls:
A/D or arrow keys to move
W or up arrow to jump and climb
Left-click on objects to interact (pickup, drop, grapple)

Stand on the time machine and interact with it to time travel. 

Click on the dark shapes to place the same kind of object there.

Created in 2 days by Fredrik and Gustaf for the GMTK 2021 game jam: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021
